result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:31 AM Defendant Michael A. Gordon appeared by video.  Attorney Nicholas Grant Smith in court for Michael A. Gordon.  Attorney Mark T. Fuhr in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim notification has been complied. Attorneys are requesting another status hearing or plea and sentencing.
Status hearing scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status hearing on November 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status hearing on September 8, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Status hearing on August 23, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Order for Appearance at Settlement Conference; Report to Court on Results of Settlement Conference.
Status hearing on August 3, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.  Defendant shall have no contact with D.A.S. - dob:  10/8/1982

02:03 PM Defendant Michael A. Gordon in court with attorney Nicholas Grant Smith.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Victim notification has been complied.  Waives further reading of the complaint, charges and penalties. Plea of not guilty entered,  District attorney requests a signature bond in the amount of $500.00; booking; no contact with D.A.A. - dob:  10-8-1982.   Court sets bond as requested.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 09:15 am.  Status hearing scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 03:15 pm. - rt
